I attempted to reproduce this on the WTP 20050617 integration build and could 
not. Below is what I did. Let me know if you can reproduce this on the 20050617 
integration build and if so, please provide details on what you're doing 
differently.

1. Launched the Web service wizard (File > New > Other > Web Services > Web 
Service
   Page 1: Select "Top Down Java Bean Web Service". Next.
   Page 2: Enter http://www.xmethods.net/sd/2001/TemperatureService.wsdl
           Next.
   Page 3: Web Service Runtime: Apache Axis 1.1
           Tomcat v5.0 Server @ localhost
           J2EE Level: 1.4
           Service project: ee
           Service module: ee
           Next.
   Click Next until the end of the wizard. Click Finish.

The service project and module were created successfully with no exceptions 
occuring during the execution on CreateModuleCommand.
Resolved 15 months ago with no activity since. Verified as working on behalf of submitter. Please resubmit if the problem recurs on WTP 1.5.1 or higher.
